trans-unit.source: Mu Yanling
trans-unit.target: 沐燕灵

trans-unit.resname: GS1·1 | Mu Yanling | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +2: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.
trans-unit.target: +2：目标生物本回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·1 | Mu Yanling | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −3: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: −3：抓两张牌。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·1 | Mu Yanling | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −10: Tap all creatures your opponents control. You take an extra turn after this one.
trans-unit.target: −10：横置所有由对手操控的生物。你于本回合后进行额外的一个回合。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·2 | Colorful Feiyi Sparrow | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Colorful Feiyi Sparrow
trans-unit.target: 肥遗彩雀

trans-unit.resname: GS1·2 | Colorful Feiyi Sparrow | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: GS1·2 | Colorful Feiyi Sparrow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: These nimble sparrows, not often seen, delight in tricking the pangolins that wander the forest.
trans-unit.target: 这灵巧小雀寻常难见，只因它们正忙于戏耍林间蹒跚的鲮鲤，并且乐此不疲。

trans-unit.source: Purple-Crystal Crab
trans-unit.target: 紫晶蟹

trans-unit.source: When Purple-Crystal Crab dies, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当紫晶蟹死去时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.source: A precious shell without, a delicious taste within.
trans-unit.target: 其壳也珍，其味也美。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·4 | Vivid Flying Fish | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vivid Flying Fish
trans-unit.target: 霓彩飞鱼

trans-unit.resname: GS1·4 | Vivid Flying Fish | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Vivid Flying Fish has flying as long as it's attacking. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 只要霓彩飞鱼正进行攻击，它便具有飞行异能。（它只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: GS1·4 | Vivid Flying Fish | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The rainbow seen above the Great Lake of Cloud Dream just after the rain is nothing but the vivid-colored flying fishes' ritual dance.
trans-unit.target: 雨后初晴，云梦大泽上那一抹虹不是别的，正是数不清的霓彩飞鱼的祭天舞蹈。

trans-unit.source: Welkin Tern
trans-unit.target: 苍穹飞燕

trans-unit.resname: GS1·5 | Welkin Tern | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: GS1·5 | Welkin Tern | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: 苍穹飞燕只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: It stops flying only as its life comes to an end.
trans-unit.target: 终其一生，唯有一次停歇，那便是归宿。

trans-unit.source: Heavenly Qilin
trans-unit.target: 寰宇麒麟

trans-unit.resname: GS1·6 | Heavenly Qilin | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: GS1·6 | Heavenly Qilin | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Heavenly Qilin attacks, another target creature you control gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当寰宇麒麟攻击时，另一个目标由你操控的生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: It strides through the universe as though stepping on the stars, crossing freely between the celestial and earthly worlds.
trans-unit.target: 踏星碎云，肆意遨游天界人间。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·7 | Armored Whirl Turtle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Armored Whirl Turtle
trans-unit.target: 覆甲旋龟

trans-unit.resname: GS1·7 | Armored Whirl Turtle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Not all enormous beasts are quick to anger.
trans-unit.target: 并不是所有大块头都有爆脾气。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·8 | Nine-Tail White Fox | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nine-Tail White Fox
trans-unit.target: 九尾白狐

trans-unit.resname: GS1·8 | Nine-Tail White Fox | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever Nine-Tail White Fox deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当九尾白狐对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·8 | Nine-Tail White Fox | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It has waited a millennium just for you, and for a millennium will it watch over your descendants.
trans-unit.target: 千年的等待，为得一朝与你相遇；又千年守望，只为得见你子孙后代繁衍生息。

trans-unit.source: Earth-Origin Yak
trans-unit.target: 地源牦牛

trans-unit.source: When Earth-Origin Yak enters the battlefield, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当地源牦牛进战场时，由你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Deep in the Northern Mountains, the yaks linger silently, channeling the powers of the earth.
trans-unit.target: 北方大山深处，它们静谧盘桓，似将大地之力驮负在身。

trans-unit.source: Moon-Eating Dog
trans-unit.target: 食月天狗

trans-unit.source: As long as you control a Yanling planeswalker, Moon-Eating Dog has flying. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 只要你操控燕灵鹏洛客，食月天狗便具有飞行异能。（它只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: The most nimble of creatures, it chases the most sacred luminence.
trans-unit.target: 最矫捷的身影擅于追逐最圣洁的光辉。

trans-unit.source: Stormcloud Spirit
trans-unit.target: 风暴云灵

trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.source: The spirits of all the rivers and oceans came together as an unstoppable force, unleashing their fury as lightning and thunder.
trans-unit.target: 结水泽汪洋之灵，化雷霆电闪之怒；纵驰睥睨，莫有可挡者。

trans-unit.source: Ancestor Dragon
trans-unit.target: 蛮荒始龙

trans-unit.resname: GS1·12 | Ancestor Dragon | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: GS1·12 | Ancestor Dragon | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures you control attack, you gain 1 life for each attacking creature.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个由你操控的生物攻击时，每有一个进行攻击的生物，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: It is said that Yinglong gave birth to the qilin and the phoenix, and after them, all the hairy and winged beings in the world. Thus it is known as the Ancestor Dragon.
trans-unit.target: 相传应龙诞凤凰、麒麟，后衍毛羽众生，因而得始龙之名。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·13 | Cloak of Mists | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cloak of Mists
trans-unit.target: 迷雾披风

trans-unit.resname: GS1·13 | Cloak of Mists | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: GS1·13 | Cloak of Mists | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·13 | Cloak of Mists | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Mystery lies beneath the haunting mists. Never stay where obscurity deepens.
trans-unit.target: 迷蒙萦绕处有玄机，混沌深邃处莫停留。

trans-unit.source: Qilin's Blessing
trans-unit.target: 麒麟祝祷

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "Interesting . . . This mortal being seems to have been blessed with Qilin's essence."\n—Mu Yanling's journal
trans-unit.target: 「真有趣. . .这凡物身上竟似有股麒麟气息萦绕。」 ～燕灵手札

trans-unit.resname: GS1·15 | Drown in Shapelessness | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drown in Shapelessness
trans-unit.target: 溺于无形

trans-unit.resname: GS1·15 | Drown in Shapelessness | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·15 | Drown in Shapelessness | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "From the swallows, I learned how to ride the winds to anywhere, and from my tears, I mastered how to harness the water."
trans-unit.target: 「驭水之力源自我泪，驭风之行习自我燕。」

trans-unit.source: Dragon's Presence
trans-unit.target: 隐龙突现

trans-unit.source: Dragon's Presence deals 5 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 隐龙突现对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成5点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "The Ancestor Dragon appeared atop the clouds, amid shattering mountains and sundering earth."\n—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue
trans-unit.target: 「山崩地裂中，始龙现身云端。」 ～旸谷纪行

trans-unit.source: Brilliant Plan
trans-unit.target: 绝妙好计

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 抓三张牌。

trans-unit.source: A heaven-sent vision is like a lantern to guide the way.
trans-unit.target: 天启示象，迷途明灯。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·18 | Rhythmic Water Vortex | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Rhythmic Water Vortex
trans-unit.target: 水韵漩咒

trans-unit.resname: GS1·18 | Rhythmic Water Vortex | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return up to two target creatures to their owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将至多两个目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·18 | Rhythmic Water Vortex | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library and/or graveyard for a card named Mu Yanling, reveal it, and put it into your hand. If you searched your library this way, shuffle it.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库和／或坟墓场中搜寻一张名称为沐燕灵的牌，展示该牌，并将它置于你手上。如果你以此法搜寻了你的牌库，则将它洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Meandering River
trans-unit.target: 蜿蜒河流

trans-unit.resname: GS1·19 | Meandering River | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Meandering River enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 蜿蜒河流须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·19 | Meandering River | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {W} or {U}.
Clouds and mists cover the lake as though it were a dreamland. When the wind rises, the mists disperse, opening great vistas of rippling reeds.
trans-unit.target: 云蒸雾绕梦泽深，苇伏风去天际远。

trans-unit.source: Plains
trans-unit.target: 平原

trans-unit.source: W
Island
trans-unit.target: 海岛

trans-unit.source: U
Jiang Yanggu
trans-unit.target: 姜旸谷

trans-unit.resname: GS1·22 | Jiang Yanggu | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: +1: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: +1：目标生物得+2/+2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·22 | Jiang Yanggu | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: −1: If you don't control a creature named Mowu, create a legendary 3/3 green Hound creature token named Mowu.
trans-unit.target: −1：如果你未操控名称为默武的生物，则派出一个传奇的3/3绿色，名称为默武的猎犬衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·22 | Jiang Yanggu | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −5: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of lands you control.
trans-unit.target: −5：直到回合结束，目标生物获得践踏异能且得+X/+X，X为由你操控的地数量。

trans-unit.source: Leopard-Spotted Jiao
trans-unit.target: 豹纹狡

trans-unit.source: This strange beast has the hide of a leopard, the howl of a dog, and the horns of an ox.
trans-unit.target: 此异兽纹若豹，音似犬，角如牛。

trans-unit.source: Feiyi Snake
trans-unit.target: 肥遗蛇

trans-unit.source: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）

trans-unit.source: Two bodies, twice the malice.
trans-unit.target: 两个身体，加倍的恶意。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·25 | Sacred White Deer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sacred White Deer
trans-unit.target: 清源白鹿

trans-unit.resname: GS1·25 | Sacred White Deer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {3}{G}, {T}: You gain 4 life. Activate this ability only if you control a Yanggu planeswalker.
trans-unit.target: {3}{G}，{T}：你获得4点生命。只能于你操控旸谷鹏洛客时起动此异能。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·25 | Sacred White Deer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The pale deer are believed to have lived a thousand years, the pure white five hundred more. Those who seek them would gladly wander the wilds forever for the merest glimpse of these sacred beings.
trans-unit.target: 千年为苍鹿，再五百始为白鹿。多少人为了它华光韵动的回眸一瞥，迷失在蛮荒山林间。

trans-unit.source: Reckless Pangolin
trans-unit.target: 莽撞鲮鲤

trans-unit.source: Whenever Reckless Pangolin attacks, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当莽撞鲮鲤攻击时，它得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "A pangolin's power grows with its speed. Strike when you have the chance!"\n—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue
trans-unit.target: 「速度就是攻击力，当出手时就出手！」 ～旸谷纪行

trans-unit.source: Giant Spider
trans-unit.target: 巨型蜘蛛

trans-unit.source: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
trans-unit.target: 延势（此生物能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。）

trans-unit.source: The welcoming appearance of the Arrow Bamboo Forest masks its deathly hostility.
trans-unit.target: 箭竹林看似云淡风轻，暗处却蕴藏着无限杀机。

trans-unit.source: Ferocious Zheng
trans-unit.target: 狞狰

trans-unit.source: Known for their glowing horn and stone-rattling roar, zheng are the fiercest predators in the forest. Few survived before Jiang Yanggu came.
trans-unit.target: 日形于涧，夜隐于林。角灯如萤，声如石鸣。受伏于姜旸谷前，未有见者还。

trans-unit.source: Fire-Omen Crane
trans-unit.target: 兆火鹤

trans-unit.resname: GS1·29 | Fire-Omen Crane | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行（此生物只能被具飞行或延势异能的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: GS1·29 | Fire-Omen Crane | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever Fire-Omen Crane attacks, it deals 1 damage to target creature an opponent controls.
trans-unit.target: 每当兆火鹤攻击时，它对目标由对手操控的生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: If you can see it clearly, you're already on fire.
trans-unit.target: 当你看清它的时候，自己身上已经着火了。

trans-unit.source: Screeching Phoenix
trans-unit.target: 煌焰鸣凤

trans-unit.resname: GS1·30 | Screeching Phoenix | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: GS1·30 | Screeching Phoenix | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}{R}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: {2}{R}：由你操控的生物得+1/+0直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Its wings are a heavenly inferno that sets the world ablaze.
trans-unit.target: 羽翼扑扇间，天火燎原。

trans-unit.source: Earthshaking Si
trans-unit.target: 撼地蛮兕

trans-unit.source: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
trans-unit.target: 践踏（此生物攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）

trans-unit.source: "For reasons unknown to me, herds in the Arrow Bamboo Forest have become more and more agitated."\n—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue
trans-unit.target: 「不知是何原因，箭竹林中的兽群近来愈发躁动不安。」 ～旸谷纪行

trans-unit.source: Hardened-Scale Armor
trans-unit.target: 坚鳞厚甲

trans-unit.resname: GS1·32 | Hardened-Scale Armor | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物

trans-unit.resname: GS1·32 | Hardened-Scale Armor | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature gets +3/+3.
trans-unit.target: 所结附的生物得+3/+3。

trans-unit.source: A pangolin's scales are resistant to all sorts of damage and weaponry. Desire for them threatens to drive the pangolin to extinction.
trans-unit.target: 鲮鲤甲片刀枪不入，水火不侵，这也成了它们终归灭绝的悲剧根源。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·33 | Breath of Fire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Breath of Fire
trans-unit.target: 烈焰吐息

trans-unit.resname: GS1·33 | Breath of Fire | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Breath of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature.
trans-unit.target: 烈焰吐息对目标生物造成2点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·33 | Breath of Fire | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Fire leads to more fire.
trans-unit.target: 火，会引出更多火来。

trans-unit.source: Aggressive Instinct
trans-unit.target: 好斗天性

trans-unit.source: Target creature you control deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.
trans-unit.target: 目标由你操控的生物对目标不由你操控的生物造成伤害，其数量等同于前者的力量。

trans-unit.source: "Mowu was wary that day, as though he sensed the danger ahead."\n—Jiang Yanggu's travelogue
trans-unit.target: 「那日，默武突而间警觉起来，似乎它也嗅到了我们即将面临的危险。」 ～旸谷纪行

trans-unit.resname: GS1·35 | Confidence from Strength | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Confidence from Strength
trans-unit.target: 狂力傲相

trans-unit.resname: GS1·35 | Confidence from Strength | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +4/+4 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to defending player or planeswalker while attacking.)
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物得+4/+4且获得践踏异能。（它攻击时造成之过量战斗伤害能对防御牌手或鹏洛客造成之。）

trans-unit.resname: GS1·35 | Confidence from Strength | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Prepare for battle!"\n—Jiang Yanggu
trans-unit.target: 「迎战！」 ～姜旸谷

trans-unit.resname: GS1·36 | Journey for the Elixir | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Journey for the Elixir
trans-unit.target: 探灵寻踪

trans-unit.resname: GS1·36 | Journey for the Elixir | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Search your library and graveyard for a basic land card and a card named Jiang Yanggu, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌和一张名称为姜旸谷的牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·36 | Journey for the Elixir | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "As my hands touched it, I realized that I had not found it—it had been leading me here."
trans-unit.target: 「当终于触碰到它的瞬间，惊觉不是我寻到了它，而是它一直在引领我。」

trans-unit.source: Cleansing Screech
trans-unit.target: 凤鸣涤焰

trans-unit.source: Cleansing Screech deals 4 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: 凤鸣涤焰对任意一个目标造成4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Crackle" and "pop" are the most wondrous sounds.
trans-unit.target: 最妙的音符莫过于「噼啪」和「哔啵」。

trans-unit.source: Timber Gorge
trans-unit.target: 林场峡谷

trans-unit.resname: GS1·38 | Timber Gorge | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Timber Gorge enters the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 林场峡谷须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: GS1·38 | Timber Gorge | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {R} or {G}.
Near the Western Seas lies Mount Zhaoyao—a forest of stones that reaches the clouds, a bountiful land of wondrous treasures and strange animals.
trans-unit.target: 招摇之山，石林穿云，临于西海，多奇珍异兽。

trans-unit.source: Mountain
trans-unit.target: 山脉

trans-unit.source: R
Forest
trans-unit.target: 树林

trans-unit.source: G
